title: On-base activities
text:
Off-base events 
A calendar of nearby events of interest to people living on U.S. facilities in the Pacific. 
Events are as accurate as possible at press time. Since times or event schedules can change, please verify events before attending. Japan 
Visit Atsugi MWR at http://tinyurl.com/3dozakn or on Facebook at http://tinyurl.com/3eytb9c . Athletics Wed. & Thu., 4-5 p.m., muay thai for ages 5-15, $50 month, Halsey Gym; Aug. 8, Captain’s Cup Badminton, coaches’ meeting Aug. 5, register by Aug. 1; Aug. 7, 7 p.m., White & Glow Run, Ranger Park, register 6 p.m.; Aug. 9, Captain’s Cup Badminton, Ranger Gym, coaches’ meeting at 11:30 a.m. Aug. 5, roster by Aug. 1; Aug. 13, Captain’s Cup Flag Football, Ranger Gym, coaches’ meeting 11:30 a.m. Aug. 11, roster by Aug. 7; Aug. 13, Captain’s Cup Flag Football, coaches’ meeting Aug. 11, register by Aug. 7; Aug. 24, Summer Basketball Tournament, coaches’ meeting Aug. 19, register by Aug. 14. Events Aug. 3-7, 10 a.m.-2 p.m., Lip Sync Battle: Tryouts; Aug. 8, 2-8:30 p.m., American Festival: Bon Odori, Taylor Field & Alliance Park (rain date Aug. 9); Aug. 10, Lip Sync Battle finalists announcement; Aug. 21, 4-6 p.m., Lip Sync Battle Battle Day 1; Aug. 22, 4-5 p.m., Lip Sync Battle: Battle Day 2. Bowling Aug. 3, 10, 17, 24 & 31, 11 a.m.-1 p.m., $1.25 games and $1 shoe rental. Child and Youth Programs, 264-3588 Aug. 3-14, session 4, register Aug. 22, 9 a.m.-5 p.m., Aug. 14, 6:30-11:30 p.m., Parents’ Night Out at Child Development Center, ages 6 weeks to 12 years, sign up the Tuesday before.
